front.title: ARP/ND Synching And IP Aliasing without IRB

abstract.t: This draft proposes an extension to [RFC7432] to do ARP synchronizing and IP aliasing for Layer 3 routes that is needed for pure L3 EVPN to build a complete IP ECMP. The phrase "pure L3 EVPN" means that there is no MAC-VRF or IRB interface in the use case.
